commits.author: Dawid Weiss
Shai Erera
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Returns the length of a file in the directory. This method follows the * following contract: *
    *
  • Throws {@link FileNotFoundException} if the file does not exist *
  • Returns a value ≥0 if the file exists, which specifies its length. *
* * @param name the name of the file for which to return the length. * @throws FileNotFoundException if the file does not exist. * @throws IOException if there was an IO error while retrieving the file's * length. */ public abstract long fileLength(String name) throws IOException;
